Class ProcessUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.util.ProcessUtils

  • public class ProcessUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility with various APIs for functions that can be performed on a Process.

      • waitFor

        public static ProcessResultType waitFor(java.lang.Process process,
                        int waitTime)
        Waits for the completion of the process for time period mentioned in waitTime.
        Parameters:
        {@link - Process} underlying process
        waitTime - time period for which application has to wait for completion of process
        Returns:
        ProcessResultType result of executed process

      • getProcessLog

        public static java.lang.String getProcessLog(java.lang.Process process,
                             int waitTime)
                                      throws ProcessTimeOutException
        Returns the information produced during the execution of the process
        Parameters:
        process - the underlying Process
        waitTime - maximum time defined for process to execute in minutes
        Returns:
        The process log String
        Throws:
        ProcessTimeOutException - if process is unable to complete in waitTime duration

      • getProcessErrorLog

        public static java.lang.String getProcessErrorLog(java.lang.Process process,
                                  int waitTime)
        Returns the error information produced during the execution of the process
        Parameters:
        process - the underlying Process
        waitTime - maximum time defined for process to execute in minutes
        Returns:
        The process error log String
